General Vim Stuff
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

#. Learn to use gcn
   - not a fan
#. Copy/paste to/from clipboard
   - gotta nice remap for that
#. Stop using H and L instead of $ and ^
#. <C-w> to delete words in insert mode.
    - amazing I love it
